conditions.5ca71afd86f7740b32433825: Find in raid 3 VPX Flash Storage Module

5448c12b4bdc2d02308b456f.Name: 90-93 9x18PM Magazine, for 8 PM rounds
5448c12b4bdc2d02308b456f.Description: Standard 8-round PM 90-93 magazine for IzhMekh-produced PM pistols. Features a side observation slot.

544a38634bdc2d58388b4568.Name: Colt USGI A2 5.56x45 Flashhider for AR-15
544a38634bdc2d58388b4568.Description: The 5.56x45 Colt USGI A2 Flashhider a.k.a. Bird Cage is designed for mounting on 5.56x45 weapons built on AR-15 system. However, it can be installed on other weapons of the same caliber, provided that barrel has the same threading for muzzle devices. A service muzzle device for M4A1.

544fb62a4bdc2dfb738b4568.Name: Russian Army pineapple juice
544fb62a4bdc2dfb738b4568.Description: Reconstituted pineapple juice "Russian Army". It's hard to imagine a better source of carbs and vitamins under the blockade conditions.

55802d5f4bdc2dac148b458e.Name: PMAG GEN M3 W 30 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magazine
55802d5f4bdc2dac148b458e.Description: 30-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 30 magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition, with an observation slot.

55802d5f4bdc2dac11k8b458e.Name: PMAG GEN M3 W 30 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magazine FDE
55802d5f4bdc2dac11k8b458e.Description: 30-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 30 FDE magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition, with an observation slot.

544fb3364bdc2d34748b456a.Name: Immobilizing splint
544fb3364bdc2d34748b456a.Description: Common splint for fixing the damaged bones in position as an emergency aid measure.

5448bd6b4bdc2dfc2f8b4569.Name: PM 9x18PM pistol
5448bd6b4bdc2dfc2f8b4569.Description: A time-proven PM. Due to the ubiquitous spread of both pistol and ammo it is still being used by Russian Spetznaz, thanks to exceptional reliability, light weight and compact size. The only serious drawback is its lack of a knockdown power.

5448ff904bdc2d6f028b456e.Name: Army Crackers
5448ff904bdc2d6f028b456e.Description: Hard and unforgiving water crackers from Russian army combat ration.

544901bf4bdc2ddf018b456d.Name: Wad of roubles
544901bf4bdc2ddf018b456d.Description: A wad of the still-valued Russian roubles.

544a378f4bdc2d30388b4567.Name: 40-round PMAG GEN M3 40 5.56x45 STANAG magazine
544a378f4bdc2d30388b4567.Description: 40-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 40 magazine for 5.56x45 ammo.

5447a9cd4bdc2dbd208b4567.Name: Colt M4A1 5.56x45 Assault Rifle
5447a9cd4bdc2dbd208b4567.Description: Colt M4A1- an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 5.56x45 NATO cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

5448c1d04bdc2dff2f8b4569.Name: PMAG GEN M3 20 5.56x45 STANAG 20-round magazine
5448c1d04bdc2dff2f8b4569.Description: 20-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 20 magazine, for 5.56x45 ammo.

54491bb74bdc2d09088b4567.Name: ER Fulcrum Bayonet
54491bb74bdc2d09088b4567.Description: Extrema Ratio developed its Fulcrum knife by the order of Italian Alpine Troops Headquarters, who required a multipurpose knife suitable for the infantry, a knife that could be used in any action and that could successfully solve any type of problem even where more specialized equipment proved inadequate. It was so successful that the multipurpose knife then led to the development of the Fulcrum Bayonet, which had the same characteristics but could be fixed to the issued rifle.

544909bb4bdc2d6f028b4577.Name: AN/PEQ-15 tactical device
544909bb4bdc2d6f028b4577.Description: ATPIAL (Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser) AN/PEQ-15 produced by L3 Insight Technologies. Tactical device that combines laser designators in both visible and IR band with IR searchlight.

544fb5454bdc2df8738b456a.Name: Leatherman Multitool
544fb5454bdc2df8738b456a.Description: With this compact and versatile multitool there is no need to be worried about having the right tools on at the right time.

54527a984bdc2d4e668b4567.Name: 5.56x45 mm M855
54527a984bdc2d4e668b4567.Description: Ball cartridge with a steel penetrator tip over a lead core in a full copper jacket.

5447ac644bdc2d6c208b4567.Name: 5.56x45 M193 Ball ammo
5447ac644bdc2d6c208b4567.Description: A box of 5.56x45 M193 Ball ammo

5448be9a4bdc2dfd2f8b456a.Name: RGD-5 hand grenade
5448be9a4bdc2dfd2f8b456a.Description: RGD-5 (Distance Hand Grenade, mod. 5) is classified as antipersonnel fragmentation time-delayed offensive hand grenade. Igniter delay time 3,2—4,2 seconds. Due to offensive type of the grenade, fragments are relatively light and have a smaller radius of dispersion.

544fb25a4bdc2dfb738b4567.Name: Aseptic bandage
544fb25a4bdc2dfb738b4567.Description: The most common gauze bandage, autoclaved and aseptic.

558032614bdc2de7118b4585.Name: Tango Down Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical grip Black
558032614bdc2de7118b4585.Description: Tango Down Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical grip. Short grip for use with weapons of close and extra close quarters combat. Ideally fits assault shotguns. Contains a compartment for batteries or SPTA.

544a3a774bdc2d3a388b4567.Name: Leupold Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm DeltaPoint hybrid assault scope
544a3a774bdc2d3a388b4567.Description: Hybrid Leupold-produced scope comprises the Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm optical sight with  DeltaPoint reflex sight installed on top of it. It was developed for precision mid-range carbine fire using the 4x optics while being equally effective in close quarters thanks to use of compact reflex sight when necessary.

54491c4f4bdc2db1078b4568.Name: MR-133 12ga shotgun
54491c4f4bdc2db1078b4568.Description: Multi-shot, smoothbore МR-133 pump-action shotgun produced by IzhMekh. Reliable and practical hunting and self-defense weapon. Considered unique in its class for having a slide stop.

55802f5d4bdc2dac148b458f.Name: Magpul MOE AR-15 pistol grip
55802f5d4bdc2dac148b458f.Description: Polymer Magpul MOE (Magpul Original Equipment) pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Thanks to ergonomic shape and anti slip texture, makes weapon grip and control more comfortable. Inside of the grip contains free space for spare parts, tools and accessories kit or   batteries.

5448fee04bdc2dbc018b4567.Name: 0.6L water bottle
5448fee04bdc2dbc018b4567.Description: A bit dirty 0.6L bottle of water.

544a11ac4bdc2d470e8b456a.Name: Secure container Alpha
544a11ac4bdc2d470e8b456a.Description: Unique secure container used only by veterans of PMCs formerly deployed in Tarkov.

544a37c44bdc2d25388b4567.Name: 60-round MAG5-60 5.56x45 STANAG magazine
544a37c44bdc2d25388b4567.Description: 60-round metal Surefire MAG5-60 high capacity magazine for 5.56x45 ammo.

544fb45d4bdc2dee738b4568.Name: Salewa FIRST AID KIT
544fb45d4bdc2dee738b4568.Description: First aid kit containing bivibag, various types of bandages and dressing tools.

557ff21e4bdc2d89578b4586.Name: Tactical glasses
557ff21e4bdc2d89578b4586.Description: Commonplace tactical glasses with glare and impact protection.

55801eed4bdc2d89578b4588.Name: SV-98 bolt-action sniper rifle
55801eed4bdc2d89578b4588.Description: SV-98 is a Russian sniper rifle developed in 1998-2000 by a group of weapon engineers led by V. Stronskiy. Serially produced by IzhMash group. It is a magazine-fed bolt-action rifle, designed to engage the military personnel at the distances of up to 1000 m.

558022b54bdc2dac148b458d.Name: Eotech EXPS3 holographic sight
558022b54bdc2dac148b458d.Description:
Eotech EXPS3 holo sight. Thanks to design features it can be used with a wide range of weapons even with non-folding sights.
Compatible with night vision devices by the means of NV reticle mode. Utilized by US SOCOM as a sight for operations in confined spaces.

545cdae64bdc2d39198b4568.Name: Camelbak Tri-Zip Backpack
545cdae64bdc2d39198b4568.Description: Mid-sized versatile assault pack. Spacious, sturdy and comfortable, this backpack is loved both by military and hikers worldwide. 34L of total space, hydration system, easy access to side pockets, near-perfect suspension and MOLLE attachment system make it a great choice for up to 72 hours autonomous hikes... or carrying a good load of loot.

544a5caa4bdc2d1a388b4568.Name: Crye Precision AVS chest rig
544a5caa4bdc2d1a388b4568.Description: Crye Precision AVS (Adaptive Vest System) is a highly versatile rig system that can be quickly turned from light low-visibility gear into a fully armored and loaded vest - and everything in between.

544fb37f4bdc2dee738b4567.Name: Analgin painkillers
544fb37f4bdc2dee738b4567.Description: The most cheap and widely spread painkillers.

5449016a4bdc2d6f028b456f.Name: Roubles
5449016a4bdc2d6f028b456f.Description: A few notes of the still-valued Russian roubles.

544a5cde4bdc2d39388b456b.Name: Flyye MBSS Backpack
544a5cde4bdc2d39388b456b.Description: Extra durable backpack from 1000D Cordura, with separate pocket for water bladder with hose slot and MOLLE attachment system on the sides.

544fb6cc4bdc2d34748b456e.Name: Slickers bar
544fb6cc4bdc2d34748b456e.Description: Sweet nutritional bar for some quick bite. Well-balance in proteins, fiber and vitamins, but a bit over the top in sweetness.

5448ba0b4bdc2d02308b456c.Name: Factory exit key
5448ba0b4bdc2d02308b456c.Description: Chemical factory emergency exit door key.

544fb3f34bdc2d03748b456a.Name: Morphine injector
544fb3f34bdc2d03748b456a.Description: Single-use syringe full of morphine - powerful drug, used primarily to treat both acute and chronic severe pain.

54527ac44bdc2d36668b4567.Name: 5.56x45 mm M855A1
54527ac44bdc2d36668b4567.Description: Enhanced Performance Round, 19-grain steel penetrator tip over a copper alloy core in a partial copper jacket.

545cdb794bdc2d3a198b456a.Name: 6B43 6A Armor
545cdb794bdc2d3a198b456a.Description: The 6B43 bulletproof vest of 6А protection class (roughly equivalent to class IIIA) is designed for protection from light weapons bullets - including BP and PP - fragments of grenades, mines, and melee weapons, as well as reducing the risk of after-penetration effects during combat situations.

55d459824bdc2d892f8b4573.Name: Knight's Armament KAC RIS handguard for AR-15 and compatibles
55d459824bdc2d892f8b4573.Description: Knight's Armament KAC RIS is a standard service handguard for M4A1, but it can be installed on the most of AR-15 based weapons provided that the barrel length is right. Equipped with 4 mounts for installation of additional accessories and a heat shield.

55d45d3f4bdc2d972f8b456c.Name: Izhmekh MP-133 Beechwood forestock
55d45d3f4bdc2d972f8b456c.Description: Standard Izhmekh-manufactured forestock, made for MP-133 shotgun out of beechwood.

56083be64bdc2d20478b456f.Name: Plastic stock for MP-133/153
56083be64bdc2d20478b456f.Description: Plastic stock for МR-133 and MP-153 shotguns with rubber butt-plate manufactured by Izhmekh.

5649b0fc4bdc2d17108b4588.Name: Izhmash polymer АК-74 stock (6P20 Sb.7)
5649b0fc4bdc2d17108b4588.Description: Polymer АК-74 stock produced by Izhmash which replaced the wooden one.

5649be884bdc2d79388b4577.Name: Colt buffer tube
5649be884bdc2d79388b4577.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

56deec93d2720bec348b4568.Name: 750 mm barrel for MP-153 12ga shotgun
56deec93d2720bec348b4568.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for МР-153 shotgun, 750 mm long for 12ga shells.

5733279d245977289b77ec24.Name: Car battery
5733279d245977289b77ec24.Description: A typical 12 V, 40 Ah lead-acid car batteries are in quite a demand with traders, who resell them in the areas that have been left without power supply.

55d355e64bdc2d962f8b4569.Name: Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for M4A1 assault rifle
55d355e64bdc2d962f8b4569.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

55d448594bdc2d8c2f8b4569.Name: 610mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun
55d448594bdc2d8c2f8b4569.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 610 mm long for 12ga shells.

55f84c3c4bdc2d5f408b4576.Name: Daniel Defence RIS II 9.5 foregrip for AR-15-compatible systems
55f84c3c4bdc2d5f408b4576.Description: Daniel Defence RIS II 9.5 foregrip is a part of the SOPMOD Block II program to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 foregrips in the US SOCOM service. Made with light but durable aircraft aluminium alloy. Equipped with 4 mounts for installation of additional devices and accessories. This foregrip option is incompatible with М203 UBGL.

56083e1b4bdc2dc8488b4572.Name: Izhmash SV-98 Rearsight
56083e1b4bdc2dc8488b4572.Description: Standard SV-98 sniper rifle rear sight by Izhmash.

56d59856d2720bd8418b456a.Name: P226R 9х19 pistol
56d59856d2720bd8418b456a.Description: The SIG Sauer P226R is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer, a standard service weapon of Navy SEALs. Chambered for the 9x19mm Parabellum, features a Picatinny rail mount on the underside of a frame.

56dff4a2d2720bbd668b456a.Name: 5.45x39 mm T
56dff4a2d2720bbd668b456a.Description: 5.45x39 mm T (GRAU Index - 7T3) - a cartridge with a tracer bullet T. It is intended for target designation and adjustment of fire during shooting, as well as for the destruction of manpower.

56e05a6ed2720bd0748b4567.Name: TSNIITOCHMASH bakelite PB side grips
56e05a6ed2720bd0748b4567.Description: Standard issue PB bakelite side grips.

56ea8222d2720b69698b4567.Name: Izhmash SV-98 bipod
56ea8222d2720b69698b4567.Description: Standard SV-98 bipod. Folded into the forestock when not used.

571a279b24597720b4066566.Name: Homespun 121mm 7.62х25 ТТ barrel with threading
571a279b24597720b4066566.Description: Homespun barrel for TT pistol, with threading for silencer installation.

572b7adb24597762ae139821.Name: Scav Vest
572b7adb24597762ae139821.Description: A fisherman's vest can more or less replace the chest rig, if the need is pressing enough.

5734758f24597738025ee253.Name: Golden neck chain
5734758f24597738025ee253.Description: Golden neck chain is bound to be a rather profitable piece of jewelry to find.

560836fb4bdc2d773f8b4569.Name: 660mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun
560836fb4bdc2d773f8b4569.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 660 mm long for 12ga shells.

560837544bdc2de22e8b456e.Name: 710mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun with rib
560837544bdc2de22e8b456e.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 710 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

5645bcc04bdc2d363b8b4572.Name: Peltor ComTac 2 headset
5645bcc04bdc2d363b8b4572.Description: The Com-Tac 2 amplifies low-level sounds while suppressing impulse noises. Water resistant for outdoor usage.

56d5a2bbd2720bb8418b456a.Name: Black polymer Sig Sauer pistol grip for P226
56d5a2bbd2720bb8418b456a.Description: Standard black polymer Sig Sauer pistol grip for P226. Manufacturer Part Code: GRIP226BLKPOL

56e0598dd2720bb5668b45a6.Name: PB 9х18PM silenced pistol
56e0598dd2720bb5668b45a6.Description: PB silenced pistol (GRAU Index 6П9) was designed for the purposes of army reconnaissance groups and USSR KGB personnel and introduced into service in 1967. Still operated nowadays by FSB special forces and internal troops of Ministry of Internal Affairs.

56ea7165d2720b6e518b4583.Name: Badger Ordnance Tactical Charging Handle Latch
56ea7165d2720b6e518b4583.Description: The Badger Ordnance Tactical Charging Handle is optimized for use with Mil Spec AR-15/M16/M4 platform rifles and features preinstalled popular Gen I Tactical Latch of the same company. All components are machined from 6061 Alloy and Mil Spec Type III Hardcoat Anodized.

572b7f1624597762ae139822.Name: Balaclava
572b7f1624597762ae139822.Description: A definitive black woolen balaclava is not only a head-warmer but soul-warmer too for anyone who is too modest for public heroic deeds.

572b7fa524597762b747ce82.Name: Lower half-mask
572b7fa524597762b747ce82.Description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member.

573476d324597737da2adc13.Name: Malboro Cigarettes
573476d324597737da2adc13.Description: Malboro Cigarettes are a big hit with the better-off part of the local smoking populace.

5734795124597738002c6176.Name: Insulating tape
5734795124597738002c6176.Description: Although insulating tape is primarily intended for insulation of wires, its practical application is limited only by the creativity of its owner. Most typical cases include minor maintenance, holding together split parts, binding some stuff together and anti-slip wrapping of handles.

55d44fd14bdc2d962f8b456e.Name: Colt AR-15 charging handle for AR-15
55d44fd14bdc2d962f8b456e.Description: Standard charging handle for AR-15 and compatible systems.

55d4b9964bdc2d1d4e8b456e.Name: Colt A2 AR-15 pistol grip
55d4b9964bdc2d1d4e8b456e.Description: Colt A2 polymer pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. Standard service grip for all AR-15-based weapons of US Army and USMC.

55d614004bdc2d86028b4568.Name: Surefire SOCOM556-MONSTER 5.56х45 silencer
55d614004bdc2d86028b4568.Description: Surefire SOCOM556-MONSTER 5.56х45 and .223 silencer, can only be installed on compatible Surefire muzzle devices.

5644bd2b4bdc2d3b4c8b4572.Name: AK-74N 5.45x39 assault rifle
5644bd2b4bdc2d3b4c8b4572.Description: Kalashnikov 5.45 mm assault rifle, developed in 1970 by М. Т. Kalashnikov, became a further evolution of AKM due to adoption of the new 5.45x39 ammunition by the military. The key design difference from the standard АК-74 is a side mount for optical and night scopes.

5648ae314bdc2d3d1c8b457f.Name: CAA RS47 foregrip for AK-compatible systems
5648ae314bdc2d3d1c8b457f.Description: The RS47 foregrip, manufactured by Command Arms with light polymer, fits the majority of rifles and carbines built on the base of АК. Equipped with two short and two long rail mounts for installing additional devices.

564ca9df4bdc2d35148b4569.Name: 6L18 45-round 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74 and compatible weapons
564ca9df4bdc2d35148b4569.Description: 45-round bakelite Izhmash 6L26 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems. Also a standard issue RPK-74 magazine.

5656d7c34bdc2d9d198b4587.Name: 7.62x39 mm PS
5656d7c34bdc2d9d198b4587.Description: 7.62x39 mm PS (Index GAU - 57-N-231) - cartridge with bullet PS with steel core

5672cb304bdc2dc2088b456a.Name: D Size Battery
5672cb304bdc2dc2088b456a.Description: D (also R20, 373, Mono, UM) - one of the standard sizes for multipurpose batteries, used in the most energy-consuming portable electric devices like portable stereos, radiosets, GM counters, and powerful hand lights.

56dff026d2720bb8668b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm BS
56dff026d2720bb8668b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm BS (Index GRAU - 7N24) - a cartridge with a special armor-piercing bullet BS. The cartridge is intended for the destruction of manpower, including equipped with personal body armor, and lightly armored weapons.

56ea8d2fd2720b7c698b4570.Name: Windham Weaponry Rail Gas Block
56ea8d2fd2720b7c698b4570.Description: Installed as replacement to standard AR-15-based weapons gas block, it adds a Picatinny rail that allows installing your own accessory front sight.

570fd6c2d2720bc6458b457f.Name: Eotech 553 holographic sight
570fd6c2d2720bc6458b457f.Description: Eotech 553 holographic collimator sight. Thanks to design features it can be used with a wide range of weapons even with non-folding sights. Compatible with night vision devices by the means of NV reticle mode. Utilized by US SOCOM as a primary sight for operations in confined spaces.

55d45f484bdc2d972f8b456d.Name: Custom plastic MP-133 forestock with mounts
55d45f484bdc2d972f8b456d.Description: Off-standard polymer forestock by third party producer for MP-133. Equipped with 2 short and 2 long mounts for installation of additional equipment.

55d480c04bdc2d1d4e8b456a.Name: 30-round 6L23 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74 and compatibles
55d480c04bdc2d1d4e8b456a.Description: 30-round polymer Izhmash 6L23 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems.

55d48a634bdc2d8b2f8b456a.Name: Kiba Arms International SPRM mount for pump-action shotguns
55d48a634bdc2d8b2f8b456a.Description: The universal SPRM 13-position mount by Kiba Arms International, for attaching additional devices to the pump-action shotguns.

5648b6ff4bdc2d3d1c8b4581.Name: Tactica Tula 10000 mount
5648b6ff4bdc2d3d1c8b4581.Description: Universal mount for АК dust cover, manufactured by Tactica Tula company. Designed for installation of optical scopes, collimator sights, laser designators and other devices and accessories on АК systems family and semiautomatic smoothbore Saiga carbines.

5649b2314bdc2d79388b4576.Name: ME adapter for АК
5649b2314bdc2d79388b4576.Description: Adapter for installation of telescopic stock buffer tubes on AKs with non-folding stocks.

5672cb724bdc2dc2088b456b.Name: Geiger-Muller counter
5672cb724bdc2dc2088b456b.Description: Gas discharge device for an automatic count of detected ionizing particles.

56742c2e4bdc2d95058b456d.Name: Zibbo lighter
56742c2e4bdc2d95058b456d.Description: Metal Zibbo gasoline lighter, renowned for being reliable and windproof.

56dff2ced2720bb4668b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm PP
56dff2ced2720bb4668b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm PP (Index GRAU - 7Н10) - cartridge with a bullet of increased penetration with a steel thermally strengthened core.

56dff338d2720bbd668b4569.Name: 5.45x39 mm PRS
56dff338d2720bbd668b4569.Description: 5.45x39 mm PRS cartridge with reduced ricochet bullet (developed for needs of special forces and law enforcement).

56e335e4d2720b6c058b456d.Name: Scav Backpack
56e335e4d2720b6c058b456d.Description: Cheap replica of some 3-day assault pack with MOLLE attachment system, adapted and enhanced by owner as much as his creativity allowed. Does not offer much comfort, and volume is far lower than that of a proper 3-day pack, but it's still a backpack alright.

56e33634d2720bd8058b456b.Name: Duffle bag
56e33634d2720bd8058b456b.Description: Gym duffle bag, generally seen before with fitness enthusiasts or long-distance commuters, is now a typical Scav attribute.

55d4837c4bdc2d1d4e8b456c.Name: 10-round Saiga 545 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74 and compatibles
55d4837c4bdc2d1d4e8b456c.Description: 10-round polymer Izhmash Saiga 545 magazine, for the AK-based civilian carbine of the same name, for 5.45x39 ammo.

560836484bdc2d20478b456e.Name: 540mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun
560836484bdc2d20478b456e.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 540 mm long for 12ga shells.

5608373c4bdc2dc8488b4570.Name: 710mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun
5608373c4bdc2dc8488b4570.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 710 mm long for 12ga shells.

56083a334bdc2dc8488b4571.Name: Plastic pistol grip for МP-133/153
56083a334bdc2dc8488b4571.Description: Plastic pistol grip for MP-133 and MP-153 shotguns for replacement of standard stock, manufactured by Izhmekh.

560d657b4bdc2da74d8b4572.Name: 2P Klesch flashlight + laser designator
560d657b4bdc2da74d8b4572.Description: Underbarrel-mounted LED flashlight "2P Klesch + LCU" produced by Zenit.

5648a69d4bdc2ded0b8b457b.Name: BlackRock chest rig
5648a69d4bdc2ded0b8b457b.Description: Artisan custom-made chest rig for wearing on top of armor in urban operations. Sturdy and versatile, it features both MOLLE and ALICE attachment systems.

5648b1504bdc2d9d488b4584.Name: Polymer AK-74 foregrip (6P20 Sb.9)
5648b1504bdc2d9d488b4584.Description: Polymer AK-74 foregrip produced by Izhmash that replaced the classic wooden one.

5649ad3f4bdc2df8348b4585.Name: Izhmash AK bakelite pistol grip (6P4 Sb.8V)
5649ad3f4bdc2df8348b4585.Description: Izhmash bakelite pistol grip for AK and compatible weapon systems.

5649b0544bdc2d1b2b8b458a.Name: AK-74 Standard Rearsight (6P1 Sb.2)
5649b0544bdc2d1b2b8b458a.Description: Standard АК-74 rear sight manufactured by Izhmash.

56742c324bdc2d150f8b456d.Name: Broken GPhone
56742c324bdc2d150f8b456d.Description: GPhone 9s - one of the previous generations of the famous smartphone model. Shattered beyond repair.

56dff216d2720bbd668b4568.Name: 5.45x39 mm HP
56dff216d2720bbd668b4568.Description: 5.45x39 mm HP Sport cartridge for target shooting. 2-part bullet with bimetal jacket and lead core.

56ea6fafd2720b844b8b4593.Name: Noveske KX3 5.56x45 flashhider
56ea6fafd2720b844b8b4593.Description: The Noveske KX3 Flash Hider, aka the Burning Pig, is designed to increase reliability in short-barreled members of AR-15 family by increasing back pressure and directing the muzzle blast forward of the shooter. Although originally designed for short-barreled AR-15s, it will work on any barrel length and have since been introduced for a variety of mounts. This particular KX3 may be used on 5.56mm barrels with 1/2x28 threading.

56ea70acd2720b844b8b4594.Name: Hensoldt FF 4-16x56 scope
56ea70acd2720b844b8b4594.Description: Hensoldt FF 4-16x56 telescopic sight was developed to deliver maximum performance and high adjustment ranges while maintaining a short optical system. With increased transparency in the blue spectral range and adjustable reticle light it is particularly comfortable under low-light conditions. The FF version of the scope has the reticle placed in the first image plane, thus, the reticle pattern is also magnified when the magnification is changed. This makes it possible to determine the distance using the MIL-DOT without having to calculate.

573476f124597737e04bf328.Name: Wilston cigarettes
573476f124597737e04bf328.Description: The image of a typical street punk would not be complete without Wilston cigarettes.

5649ab884bdc2ded0b8b457f.Name: Zenit DTK-1 7.62х39 & 5.45x39 muzzlebrake & compensator for АК
5649ab884bdc2ded0b8b457f.Description: Muzzlebrake compensator DTK-1 by Zenit is designed for installation on 7.62х39 and 5.45х39 AK-based weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the barrel climb. The crown on the DTK nose is meant for breaking of tampered glass. 24x1.5 mm threading. ©Zenit

5673de654bdc2d180f8b456d.Name: Can of pacific saury
5673de654bdc2d180f8b456d.Description: Smoked pacific saury in a tin can offers some easily digestible protein and aliphatic acid, making it a nice addition to the ration.

56dff3afd2720bba668b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm PS
56dff3afd2720bba668b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm PS (Index GRAU - 7Н6) - cartridge with steel core PS bullet.

57347d692459774491567cf1.Name: Can of green peas
57347d692459774491567cf1.Description: Can of green peas, rich in vitamins and selenium, which makes it especially valuable in the dubious environmental conditions of Norvinsk region.

55d482194bdc2d1d4e8b456b.Name: 60-round 6L31 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74 and compatibles
55d482194bdc2d1d4e8b456b.Description: 60-round quad-stack polymer Izhmash 6L31 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems. Produced as a small batch, never serialized.

55d4887d4bdc2d962f8b4570.Name: Colt AR-15 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magazine
55d4887d4bdc2d962f8b4570.Description:
30-round metal Colt AR-15 magazine designed in compliance with STANAG 4179 standard for 5.56х45 ammo.
The STANAG 4179 standard was approved by NATO members in 1980 for the purposes of unification of allied personnel ammo and magazines.

560835c74bdc2dc8488b456f.Name: 510mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun with rib
560835c74bdc2dc8488b456f.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 510 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

560d75f54bdc2da74d8b4573.Name: 7.62x54 R SNB ammo
560d75f54bdc2da74d8b4573.Description: A pack of 7.62x54 R SNB cartridges

5649af884bdc2d1b2b8b4589.Name: Zenit B-33 dust cover for АК-74
5649af884bdc2d1b2b8b4589.Description: B-33 dust cover with integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on AK system. Allows installation of all Picatinny-mountable sights, ensuring the consistency of median aimpoint even after repeated removal and replacement of dust cover. © Zenit

5649b1c04bdc2d16268b457c.Name: Izhmash wooden АК-74 stock (6P20 Sb.5)
5649b1c04bdc2d16268b457c.Description: Standard wooden АК-74 stock produced by Izhmash.

5672c92d4bdc2d180f8b4567.Name: Dorm room 118 Key
5672c92d4bdc2d180f8b4567.Description: A dorm room key with 118 tag on it.

56d59d3ad2720bdb418b4577.Name: 9x19 mm Pst gzh
56d59d3ad2720bdb418b4577.Description: 9x19 mm Pst gzh round. Steel core bullet. Developed by TSNIITOCHMASH in the early 90s. Bullet weight — 5,4 g, muzzle velocity — 445—470 m/s. It outperforms the commercially available 9×19 mm Parabellum ordnance and corresponds to the more powerful 9×19 mm NATO army rounds (9×19 +P). The bullet hits through 4 mm plate of St.3 steel at distance of 55 m.

56d5a77ed2720b90418b4568.Name: Sig Sauer P226 Standard Rearsight
56d5a77ed2720b90418b4568.Description: Standard Sig Sauer Rearsight for P226. Manufacturer Part Code: CONTRASTREAR8

56dff4ecd2720b5f5a8b4568.Name: 5.45x39 mm US
56dff4ecd2720b5f5a8b4568.Description: 5.45x39 mm US (GRAU-7U1 index) is a cartridge with a low-speed US bullet.

571659bb2459771fb2755a12.Name: DI ECS FDE pistol grip for AR-15 based systems
571659bb2459771fb2755a12.Description: ECS polymer pistol grip can be installed at any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. The only difference from standard one is color.

571a282c2459771fb2755a69.Name: Standard TT side grips
571a282c2459771fb2755a69.Description: Standard post-war issue TT pistol side grips.

571a28e524597720b4066567.Name: Makeshift 7.62х25 ТТ silencer
571a28e524597720b4066567.Description: Makeshift silencer for TT with homespun barrel. Install and operate at your own discretion.

55d4ae6c4bdc2d8b2f8b456e.Name: High Standard M4SS Stock
55d4ae6c4bdc2d8b2f8b456e.Description: Telescopic High Standard M4SS stock closely follows the classic M4A1 stock except for few geometry details.

560837154bdc2da74d8b4568.Name: 660mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun with rib
560837154bdc2da74d8b4568.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 660 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

56083eab4bdc2d26448b456a.Name: SV-98 anti-heat ribbon
56083eab4bdc2d26448b456a.Description: Anti-heat ribbon for an SV-98 sniper rifle. Applied to the barrel. Prevents hot air from rising directly from the barrel and creating optical distortions in the line of fire.

5648a7494bdc2d9d488b4583.Name: PACA Soft Armor
5648a7494bdc2d9d488b4583.Description: Light but durable and reliable body armor protecting only the vital areas, fitted with II class armor plates.

564caa3d4bdc2d17108b458e.Name: TGP-A 5.45х39 muzzle device/suppressor
564caa3d4bdc2d17108b458e.Description: Tactical muzzle device/suppressor TGP-A, manufactured by State R&D Agency "Special devices and Comms" for AK-based 5.45х39 automatic rifles.

567143bf4bdc2d1a0f8b4567.Name: Pistol case
567143bf4bdc2d1a0f8b4567.Description: The case for pistol and ammo storage. Features a reliable locking mechanism that requires a key.

571a12c42459771f627b58a0.Name: TT pistol 7.62х25 TT
571a12c42459771f627b58a0.Description: A legendary pistol. It has seen numerous military conflicts and is still being in service in the certain spots of our planet, in one modification or another. This one is a classic TT-33, the most mass-produced version. It features Browning short-recoil tilting-barrel system, but very different otherwise - purposefully simple, single-action, no safety measures except half cock notch, it is able to withstand horrible operating abuse. Thanks to powerful 7.62x25 cartridge and relatively long barrel, TT boasts high muzzle velocity, penetration and impressive accuracy, even over long distances.

55d4af3a4bdc2d972f8b456f.Name: UTG Low Profile A2 Frontsight AR-15
55d4af3a4bdc2d972f8b456f.Description: Detachable UTG Low Profile A2 Frontsight, installed over Windham Weaponry Gas Block.

5649ae4a4bdc2d1b2b8b4588.Name: Zenit RK-3 AK pistol grip
5649ae4a4bdc2d1b2b8b4588.Description: RK-3 Classica anatomic pistol grip features built-in hermetically sealed battery storage compartment and is designed for installation as replacement of standard AK pistol grip.©Zenit

5672cb124bdc2d1a0f8b4568.Name: AA Battery
5672cb124bdc2d1a0f8b4568.Description: AA Battery, used over a wide array of consumer devices.

56ea8180d2720bf2698b456a.Name: KAC QD Compensator 5.56x45
56ea8180d2720bf2698b456a.Description: The KAC 5.56 QD muzzle compensator/flashhider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as a platform for attaching a KAC quick detach QDSS-NT4 sound suppressor. Installed on weapons based on AR-15/M16/M4.

5734779624597737e04bf329.Name: CPU Fan
5734779624597737e04bf329.Description: In conditions of total deficiency of elementary goods and conveniences, CPU cooling fans come in handy for crafty locals - wind power generators made from them charge radios, they are used as household fans, and even serve as vent intakes, replacing native heavy blades.

55d449444bdc2d962f8b456d.Name: 610mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun with rib
55d449444bdc2d962f8b456d.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 610 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

55d485be4bdc2d962f8b456f.Name: PM/PPSH 9х18PM 84-round drum mag for PM
55d485be4bdc2d962f8b456f.Description: Makeshift 84-round PM magazine. First assembled by an unknown genius by combining PM and PPSH magazines into a single design for operations in narrow spaces with the aid of ballistic shields. Although it was never serialized even in the smallest number, it can be crafted pretty easily provided you have the donor mags and skillful hands.

55d5f46a4bdc2d1b198b4567.Name: Colt A2 Rearsight AR-15
55d5f46a4bdc2d1b198b4567.Description: Detachable Colt A2 Rearsight. Standard issue for M4A1.

5648b4534bdc2d3d1c8b4580.Name: B-10М foregrip and rail mount B-19
5648b4534bdc2d3d1c8b4580.Description: Integrally machined B-10M foregrip is manufactured from aluminium alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on AK series 103, 104, 105, 74C, 74M, AKM and AKMS. B-19 rail mount is basically a sight support hovering over gas tube. Also integrally machined from D16T aluminium alloy with black coating, it can be installed on B-10M or B-21M foregrips.©Zenit

5648b62b4bdc2d9d488b4585.Name: GP-34 underbarrel grenade launcher
5648b62b4bdc2d9d488b4585.Description: Underbarrel grenade launcher for 40mm VOG-25 grenades, installed on AK family of assault rifles.

5649aa744bdc2ded0b8b457e.Name: Izhmash 5.45x39 АК-74 muzzlebrake & compensator (6P20 0-20)
5649aa744bdc2ded0b8b457e.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced muzzlebrake and compensator for АК-74 and weapon systems based on it.

56def37dd2720bec348b456a.Name: X400 tactical flashlight
56def37dd2720bec348b456a.Description: SureFire X400 combined LED and red laser Weapon Light.

572b7fa124597762b472f9d2.Name: Beanie
572b7fa124597762b472f9d2.Description: Warm knitted beanie, traditionally made for skiers but worn by everyone.

5734770f24597738025ee254.Name: Strike Cigarettes
5734770f24597738025ee254.Description: Strike Cigarettes can be sold off to traders for their personal use later.

573477e124597737dd42e191.Name: PC CPU
573477e124597737dd42e191.Description: PC central processing units, in lack of properly working computers, have found their purpose as a construction material for makeshift antenna reflector-type parasites.

55d35ee94bdc2d61338b4568.Name: 260mm barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5.56х45
55d35ee94bdc2d61338b4568.Description: A barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56х45 NATO ammo, 260mm long. Corresponds with standard service M4 CQBR barrel.

55d3632e4bdc2d972f8b4569.Name: 370mm barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5.56х45
55d3632e4bdc2d972f8b4569.Description: A barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56х45 NATO ammo, 370mm long. Corresponds with standard service M4A1 barrel.

56dff061d2720bb5668b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm BT
56dff061d2720bb5668b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm BT (GRAU index - 7BT4) - cartridge with armor-piercing tracer bullet BT. It is intended for the destruction of manpower, including equipped with personal body armor, fire adjustments and target designation.

56ea7293d2720b8d4b8b45ba.Name: Sight Mount Sig 220-239 rear sight bearing
56ea7293d2720b8d4b8b45ba.Description: 220-239 rear sight bearing produced by Sight Mount company for Sig Sauer 220, 226, 227, 229, 239 pistols. It is installed as a replacement of the standard rear sight and allows to use it if no scope is installed.

5710c24ad2720bc3458b45a3.Name: F-1 Hand grenade
5710c24ad2720bc3458b45a3.Description: F-1 hand grenade (GRAU Index 57-Г-721) is an anti-personnel fragmentation defensive grenade, designed for neutralizing enemy personnel in the defensive combat. Due to significant effective fragmentation radius it can only be thrown from behind the cover, APC or tank.

572b7d8524597762b472f9d1.Name: Baseball cap
572b7d8524597762b472f9d1.Description: Baseball cap, the most basic device for glare protection.

559ba5b34bdc2d1f1a8b4582.Name: 10-round polymer magazine 7.62x54R for SV-98
559ba5b34bdc2d1f1a8b4582.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced polymer magazine for SV-98 rifle, 7.62x54R ammo.

55d48ebc4bdc2d8c2f8b456c.Name: Delta-tek Sprut mount for pump-action shotguns
55d48ebc4bdc2d8c2f8b456c.Description: The Delta-tek Sprut mount is developed for installation on tube magazines of pump-action shotguns like МP-133, МP-153, МP-135, Benelli M2, Winchester 1300 and so on. Features 3 Weaver mounts for attachment of additional devices.

5608379a4bdc2d26448b4569.Name: 750mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun with rib
5608379a4bdc2d26448b4569.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 750 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

560838c94bdc2d77798b4569.Name: Remington Tactical Choke 12ga
560838c94bdc2d77798b4569.Description: Remington Tactical Choke 12ga was developed specifically for use on tactical shotguns and self-defence shotguns. Combines the properties of both cylinder and flashhider.

56deed6ed2720b4c698b4583.Name: Izhmekh МP-153 Polymer stock
56deed6ed2720b4c698b4583.Description: Standard Izhmekh-manufactured polymer stock for MP-153 shotgun.

56dfef82d2720bbd668b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm BP
56dfef82d2720bbd668b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm BP (Index GRAU - 7N22) - Cartridge with armor-piercing bullet BP.

56eabcd4d2720b66698b4574.Name: MK12 Low Profile Gas Block
56eabcd4d2720b66698b4574.Description: The MK12 Gas Block is only compatible with the RIS II (M4A1 & MK18) family of rail systems manufactured by Daniel Defense. It is not compatible with any other Daniel Defense rail system. This is due to various clearance issues. This only applies to rail system lengths that would completely shroud the gas block. If you are mounting the gas block to the barrel without being shrouded by the rail system, then this does not apply. In that case, it will fit as long as barrel diameter is .750.

57235b6f24597759bf5a30f1.Name: AN/PVS-14 Night Vision Monocular
57235b6f24597759bf5a30f1.Description:
AN/PVS-14 Monocular Night Vision Device.
Army/Navy Portable Visual Search device allows nighttime detection of targets on distances of up to 350m with 40°
FOV and adjustable brightness.

55d4491a4bdc2d882f8b456e.Name: 510mm barrel for MP-133 12ga
55d4491a4bdc2d882f8b456e.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 510 mm long for 12ga shells.

55d481904bdc2d8c2f8b456a.Name: 45-round 6L26 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74 and compatibles
55d481904bdc2d8c2f8b456a.Description: 45-round polymer Izhmash 6L26 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems.

560836b64bdc2d57468b4567.Name: 540mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun with rib
560836b64bdc2d57468b4567.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 540 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

5648b2414bdc2d3b4c8b4578.Name: UltiMAK M1-B handguard for АК
5648b2414bdc2d3b4c8b4578.Description: M1-B designed by Ultimak only replaces the standard gas tube, turning it into a scope mount. The lower foregrip part remains the same; in this case, polymer AK-47 foregrip. Additionally fastened to the barrel for improved reliability.

564ca99c4bdc2d16268b4589.Name: 6L20 30-round 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74 and compatible weapons
564ca99c4bdc2d16268b4589.Description: 30-round bakelite Izhmash 6L20 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems.

56d5a407d2720bb3418b456b.Name: SIG Sauer P226R 9x19 pistol slide
56d5a407d2720bb3418b456b.Description: Blued SIG Sauer Mk25 slide for 9x19 P226.

56d5a661d2720bd8418b456b.Name: Sig Sauer Standard Frontsight
56d5a661d2720bd8418b456b.Description: Standard frontsight for P226. Manufacturer Part Code: SIGHTCONTRASTFR

56dee2bdd2720bc8328b4567.Name: MP-153 12ga semi-automatic shotgun
56dee2bdd2720bc8328b4567.Description: Smoothbore multi-shot MP-153 shotgun, produced by Izhmekh. Reliable and practical hunting and self-defence weapon.

56dff421d2720b5f5a8b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm SP
56dff421d2720b5f5a8b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm SP Sporting cartridge for target practice.

56eabf3bd2720b75698b4569.Name: MOE Carbine stock
56eabf3bd2720b75698b4569.Description: Drop-in replacement buttstock for AR15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear.

570fd79bd2720bc7458b4583.Name: OKP-7 reflex sight
570fd79bd2720bc7458b4583.Description: The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing.

573474f924597738002c6174.Name: Chainlet
573474f924597738002c6174.Description: A small piece of jewelry worn around the neck. Depending on the materials and weight, can be quite valuable even now.

55d484b44bdc2d1d4e8b456d.Name: 6-shell MP-133х8 12ga magazine
55d484b44bdc2d1d4e8b456d.Description: 6-shell capacity tube magazine by Izhmekh, for MP-133 12ga shells.

55d6190f4bdc2d87028b4567.Name: Surefire SOCOM556-MINI MONSTER 5.56х45 Silencer
55d6190f4bdc2d87028b4567.Description: Surefire SOCOM556-MINI MONSTER 5.56х45 and .223 silencer is a shorter version of the SOCOM556-MONSTER. Can only be installed on compatible Surefire muzzle devices.

560837824bdc2d57468b4568.Name: 750mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun
560837824bdc2d57468b4568.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 750 mm long for 12ga shells.

56083cba4bdc2de22e8b456f.Name: Wooden stock for MP-133/153
56083cba4bdc2de22e8b456f.Description: Wooden stock for MP-133 and MP-153 shotguns with rubber butt-plate manufactured by Izhmekh.

5648ac824bdc2ded0b8b457d.Name: Zenit RP-1 charge handle for AK
5648ac824bdc2ded0b8b457d.Description:
RP-1 charge handle by Zenit is a milled detail, manufactured with D16T aluminium alloy with black coating. Compatible with all models of AK rifles and carbines based on it. 
RP-1 is larger and more convenient than the standard charge handle, which improves the weapon ergonomics and makes handling more comfortable. The RP-1 is installed above the base handle through kit-enclosed bolts. © Zenit

5649a2464bdc2d91118b45a8.Name: NcStar MPR45 Backup mount
5649a2464bdc2d91118b45a8.Description: Universal mount by NcStar that allows installing the auxiliary sight at 45 degrees angle.

5649ade84bdc2d1b2b8b4587.Name: Izhmash AK polymer pistol grip (6P1 Sb.8)
5649ade84bdc2d1b2b8b4587.Description: Izhmash polymer pistol grip for AK and compatibles, designed to replace the old bakelite grip.

5649d9a14bdc2d79388b4580.Name: Tactica Tula TT01 Rearsight Weaver Adapter
5649d9a14bdc2d79388b4580.Description: Rear sight adapter ТТ01, designed by Tactica Tula company for AK. Installed in place of a standard sight, and allows to use it if no alternative sight is installed.

56e294cdd2720b603a8b4575.Name: Mystery Ranch Terraplane Backpack
56e294cdd2720b603a8b4575.Description: This durable, made with 500 Cordura, spacious, comfortable to wear and well-organized extra large backpack can hold half of Tarkov and still have some space left.

570fd721d2720bc5458b4596.Name: Walther MRS reflex sight
570fd721d2720bc5458b4596.Description: Reflex Walther Multi-Reticle Point Sight features 2 dots and 2 reticles with adjustable brightness levels. Cheap, accurate (but has to zeroed every time the reticle type is switched), compact and offers good battery life - but not too sturdy and reliable.

55d485804bdc2d8c2f8b456b.Name: 8-shell MP-133х8 12ga magazine

5649af094bdc2df8348b4586.Name: Izhmash АК-74 dust cover (6P1 0-1)
5649af094bdc2df8348b4586.Description: Standard АК-74 top dust cover by Izhmash.

5656eb674bdc2d35148b457c.Name: 40 mm VOG-25
5656eb674bdc2d35148b457c.Description: 40 mm VOG grenade launcher fragmentation round

569668774bdc2da2298b4568.Name: Euros
569668774bdc2da2298b4568.Description: Several notes of the EU currency

56dff0bed2720bb0668b4567.Name: 5.45x39 mm FMJ
56dff0bed2720bb0668b4567.Description: 5.45x39 mm FMJ sport cartridge for target practice. 2-part bullet, bimetal jacket.

56e33680d2720be2748b4576.Name: Transformer Bag
56e33680d2720be2748b4576.Description: A rather spacious messenger bag, large enough to fit a lunchbox, laptop and some papers - or a small emergency survival kit. Its transformable sling and universal size allow it to be worn both as bag and a compact backpack.

571a29dc2459771fb2755a6a.Name: tt-105 7.62х25 ТТ Magazine

573475fb24597737fb1379e1.Name: Apollon Soyuz cigarettes
573475fb24597737fb1379e1.Description: Apollon Soyuz cigarettes will take you to the stars from a cough when you inhale them.

5734773724597737fd047c14.Name: Condensed milk
5734773724597737fd047c14.Description: Condensed milk that once was a part of field ration for the Union soldiers in Civil War have since reached unprecedented popularity in post-Soviet countries, becoming almost a staple product. Canned, it can be stored for decades and remain just as sweet, tasty and nutritious.

573478bc24597738002c6175.Name: Horse figurine
573478bc24597738002c6175.Description: Horrendously kitsch horse figurine is useless in Tarkov - just as anywhere else - but somewhere out there, there are dealers still willing to buy such things. Something is not right about this.

57347c5b245977448d35f6e1.Name: Bolts
57347c5b245977448d35f6e1.Description: Bolts, together with nuts, are used to fasten things in place.

57347b8b24597737dd42e192.Description: A matchbox full of safety matches. Lighters are more reliable and easier to use, but that's exactly why everybody tries to keep them hidden when asked for a light.

57347c93245977448d35f6e3.Name: Toothpaste

5737300424597769942d5a01.Description: A paper package of 5.45х39 US gs cartridges, 30 pieces.

5751496424597720a27126da.Name: Hot Rod
5751496424597720a27126da.Description: Hot Rod, though being the most recognizable energy drink in the world, is not much more powerful that its counterparts. The standards are the same for all.

575146b724597720a27126d5.Name: Pack of milk
575146b724597720a27126d5.Description: 1L package of milk that mysteriously survived until now.

57486e672459770abd687134.Name: OKP-7 reflex sight
57486e672459770abd687134.Description: The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing. This variant is installed on the dovetail type mount.

57505f6224597709a92585a9.Name: Alyonka chocolate bar
57505f6224597709a92585a9.Description: The best known milk chocolate of post-Soviet space, sweet and creamy.

573733c72459776b0b7b51b0.Name: 30 pcs. 5.45х39 SP ammo box
573733c72459776b0b7b51b0.Description: A box of 5.45х39 SP sport-hunting cartridges, 30 pieces.

5751435d24597720a27126d1.Name: Max energy
5751435d24597720a27126d1.Description: Max Energy energy drink, designed like a battery, but different in contents - regular caffeine,  sugar, and flavoring.

574d967124597745970e7c94.Name: Simonov Semi-Automatic Carbine SKS 7.62x39
574d967124597745970e7c94.Description: Soviet semi-automatic carbine designed by Sergei Simonov for 7.62x39 cartridge and known abroad as SKS-45. Immensely popular both in CIS countries and in the West, this weapon is still in active service in some countries in form of various copies and modifications. This particular specimen comes from extended storage warehouses of Tula Arms Plant and haven't yet undergo the civilian weapon normalization procedure.

57513f07245977207e26a311.Name: Apple juice
57513f07245977207e26a311.Description: Clarified and reconstituted apple juice, a bit refreshing, a bit sweet.

5751487e245977207e26a315.Name: Emelya rye croutons
5751487e245977207e26a315.Description: Emelya rye croutons with assorted flavours were a favourite snack of teens and lazy beer drinkers, but, unlike them, stayed behind.

576a581d2459771e7b1bc4f1.Name: Yarygin MP-443 Grach 9х19 pistol
576a581d2459771e7b1bc4f1.Description: Russian-produced semiautomatic 9х19 pistol, a service weapon of Russian army, special forces of Ministry of internal affairs and other defence and law enforcement agencies.

57514643245977207f2c2d09.Name: TarCola
57514643245977207f2c2d09.Description: TarCola is a widely spread cola-flavored soft drink produced, before the conflict, by a local drinks manufacturer.

5755356824597772cb798962.Name: AI-2 medikit
5755356824597772cb798962.Description: The AI-2 medikit was developed as a standard service first aid kit for various defence and law enforcement agencies and civil defense forces of USSR. In case of all-out conflict with the use of weapons of mass destruction it should have been distributed to the population  of the affected and surrounding areas.

576167ab2459773cad038c43.Name: SOK-12 Protection tube
576167ab2459773cad038c43.Description: Standard-issue threading protection tube for SOK-12.

5751a89d24597722aa0e8db0.Name: Golden Star Balm
5751a89d24597722aa0e8db0.Description: Famous Vietnamese Golden Star Balm, also known as Cao Sao Vang is made from essential oils like Camphor, Menthol, Peppermint, Cajuput. Balm for external use: a small amount of ше is applied to the sub-district and rubbing of the skin: for headache - the temples and the nape of the neck, with a cold - under the nostrils, the common cold - in the chest, back, abdomen, insect bites - on the place of bite. Precautions and special instructions: Intended for external use only.

57616a9e2459773c7a400234.Name: Sb.5 5-round 12x76 magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons
57616a9e2459773c7a400234.Description: 5-round Sb.5 polymer plastic magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons, intended for use with 12x76  or 12x70 shells.

57616c112459773cce774d66.Name: Izhmash SOK-12 Sb.0-2 dust cover
57616c112459773cce774d66.Description: Standard issue Izhmash-manufactured SOK-12 metal dust cover.

5755383e24597772cb798966.Name: Vaseline
5755383e24597772cb798966.Description: Vaseline, or, more precisely, petroleum jelly, is a versatile ointment used for a number of purposes where its water insulation and lubrication properties are required, for instance, treating small cuts and burns, coating corrosion-prone items or lubricating gear that requires non-acidic lubricants.

577d128124597739d65d0e56.Name: Burris FastFire Weaver Base
577d128124597739d65d0e56.Description: This base from Burris allows to mount the compact FastFire Series Sights to a Weaver or Picatinny-style rail.

576165642459773c7a400233.Name: Saiga 12ga ver. 10 12x76 assault rifle
576165642459773c7a400233.Description: Semi-automatic 12ga carbine with folding stock and firing mechanism safety lock that only allows firing from extended stock position. Features short 430mm barrel.

576fd4ec2459777f0b518431.Name: Zenit-Belomo PSO 1M2-1 4x24 scope
576fd4ec2459777f0b518431.Description: Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Special Sniper Rifle (VSS) and Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.

5780cda02459777b272ede61.Name: Dorm room 306 Key
5780cda02459777b272ede61.Description: A dorm room key with 306 tag on it.

576a63cd2459771e796e0e11.Name: Polymer Izhmekh pistol grip for MP-443
576a63cd2459771e796e0e11.Description: Standard service pistol grip for MP-443 manufactured by Izhmekh.

576169e62459773c69055191.Name: SOK-12 polymer handguard Sb.7-1
576169e62459773c69055191.Description: The Sb.7-1 is a standard polymer handguard with sling swivel installed on SOK-12 and SOK-12S.

5780cf9e2459777df90dcb73.Name: Dorm room 218 Key
5780cf9e2459777df90dcb73.Description: A dorm room key with 218 tag on it.

577d141e24597739c5255e01.Name: Burris FastFire 3 Reflex Sight
577d141e24597739c5255e01.Description: Light  and  tough,  the  FastFire  series  puts an  unmistakable,  bright  red  dot  on  your target  to  give  you  an  immediate  speed and  accuracy  advantage.  Can  be  used  as  a  primary sight or paired on top of an existing sight.

576a7c512459771e796e0e17.Name: B-8 mount
576a7c512459771e796e0e17.Description: B-8 rail mount is installed on Yarygin pistol (MP-443 Grach and its civilian version MP-446 Viking) for use with additional attachments, e.g. 2KS Klesch Mini tactical laser flashlight.

5780d07a2459777de4559324.Name: Portable cabin key
5780d07a2459777de4559324.Description: A key to one of the portable on-site cabins, probably the one that is used by guards.

5780cfa52459777dfb276eb1.Name: Dorm room 220 Key
5780cfa52459777dfb276eb1.Description: A dorm room key with 220 tag on it.

5780cf942459777df90dcb72.Name: Dorm room 214 Key
5780cf942459777df90dcb72.Description: A dorm room key with 214 tag on it.

57616ca52459773c69055192.Name: Izhmash SOK-12 АК type stock
57616ca52459773c69055192.Description: Izhmash-made folding polymer AK-styled stock for SOK-12.

577e1c9d2459773cd707c525.Name: Printer paper
577e1c9d2459773cd707c525.Description: Office-grade paper for printers and copiers, it can nevertheless be used for writing as well, just like any paper.

5780cf722459777a5108b9a1.Name: Dorm room 308 Key
5780cf722459777a5108b9a1.Description: A dorm room key with 308 tag on it.

57838ad32459774a17445cd2.Name: Special Sniper Rifle VSS Vintorez
57838ad32459774a17445cd2.Description: VSS (Vintovka Sniperskaya Specialnaya, Special Sniper Rifle) - suppressed sniper rifle with integral suppressor, designed in the 80s in TSNIITochMash Institute for the needs of special-purpose teams and task forces.

57838e1b2459774a256959b1.Name: VSS Vintorez Standard Rearsight
57838e1b2459774a256959b1.Description: Standard mechanical vertically adjustable rear sight for VSS Vintorez.

5780cf7f2459777de4559322.Name: Marked key
5780cf7f2459777de4559322.Description: Key with strange symbol scratched on it.

5780cf692459777de4559321.Name: Dorm room 315 Key
5780cf692459777de4559321.Description: A dorm room key with 315 tag on it.

578395e82459774a0e553c7b.Name: TSNIITochMash VSS Vintorez stock
578395e82459774a0e553c7b.Description: Wooden VSS Vintorez stock produced by TSNIITochMash/

5780d0532459777a5108b9a2.Name: Customs office key
5780d0532459777a5108b9a2.Description: Key to the Customs office building

57838c962459774a1651ec63.Name: VSS 9х39 integral barrel-suppressor
57838c962459774a1651ec63.Description: TSNIITochMash-manufactured integral barrel-suppressor module for VSS Vintorez.

578395402459774a256959b5.Name: VSS Vintorez dust cover
578395402459774a256959b5.Description: Standard steel VSS Vintorez top dust cover by TSNIITochMash.

5798a2832459774b53341029.Name: Customs plan
5798a2832459774b53341029.Description: A plan of the vast Customs premises, maybe not the most up-to date, but still better than nothing.

57838f0b2459774a256959b2.Name: 10-round 6L24 9x39 VSS magazine
57838f0b2459774a256959b2.Description: 10-round polymer TSNIITochMash 6L24 magazine for 9x39 VSS ammo.

57aca93d2459771f2c7e26db.Name: ELCAN SpecterDR 1x/4x Scope FDE
57aca93d2459771f2c7e26db.Description: The SpecterDR (Dual Role) 1x/4x scope from Specter scope series designed by ELCAN has marked a breakthrough in the optic sight development by becoming the first variable scope that truly has two work modes, switching from 4x magnification to 1x in one touch.

57838f9f2459774a150289a0.Name: 20-round 6L25 9x39 VSS magazine
57838f9f2459774a150289a0.Description: 20-round polymer TSNIITochMash 6L25 magazine for 9x39 VSS and AS VAL ammo.

57a3459f245977764a01f703.Name: B-3 mount
57a3459f245977764a01f703.Description: B-3 mounts are fixed on the VSS or VAL suppressor to form a Picatinny rail for installation of additional weapon equipment.

57a0dfb82459774d3078b56c.Name: 9х39 mm SP-5
57a0dfb82459774d3078b56c.Description: A sniper cartridge manufactured with high accuracy, has a bullet with a steel core. To engage targets protected by 1-3 class armor.

57acb6222459771ec34b5cb0.Name: Pilad 043-02 Mount
57acb6222459771ec34b5cb0.Description: Aluminium sight support with Picatinny rail mount for installation of scopes and accessories.

579204f224597773d619e051.Name: PM (t) 9х18PM pistol
579204f224597773d619e051.Description: A semi-mythical PM with extended barrel and suppressor mount threading. Some claim it was a limited series manufactured in Bulgaria, others insist on DDR, and some are even prone to think of it as a handcrafted upgrade. How did it end up in the Norvinsk region, no living soul can tell.

57a349b2245977762b199ec7.Name: Door key
57a349b2245977762b199ec7.Description: Old key, apparently even Soviet-made, most likely it's from administration building doors.

57ac965c24597706be5f975c.Name: ELCAN SpecterDR 1x/4x Scope
57ac965c24597706be5f975c.Description: The SpecterDR (Dual Role) 1x/4x scope from Specter scope series designed by ELCAN has marked a breakthrough in the optic sight development by becoming the first variable scope that truly has two work modes, switching from 4x magnification to 1x in one touch.

57af48872459771f0b2ebf11.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip FDE
57af48872459771f0b2ebf11.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57ade1442459771557167e15.Name: Armacon Baskak stock
57ade1442459771557167e15.Description: Russian-made light tube stock of very spartan design for use with AK systems that can be installed both on Mil-Spec and Com-Spec M/AR standard receiver adaptors. Not compatible with AR systems!

57adff4f24597737f373b6e6.Name: Sig BRAVO4 4X30 Scope
57adff4f24597737f373b6e6.Description: Designed by Sig, BRAVO4 4X30 optical scope sight features the uniquely large FOV, 43% wider than closest competitors. It also has an extra rail mount on top of it that allows installation of backup compact sight.

57c44b372459772d2b39b8ce.Name: AS VAL
57c44b372459772d2b39b8ce.Description: AS VAL (Avtomat Specialniy, Special Automatic Rifle) - silenced automatic rifle with integral suppressor designed for special forces units. Developed in TSNIITochMash on the VSS Vintorez platform.

57a0e5022459774d1673f889.Name: 9х39 mm SP-6
57a0e5022459774d1673f889.Description: Armor-piercing modification of the cartridge SP-5. It is a cartridge with a half-shell bullet with a core of high-carbon steel. It allows you to confidently hit targets protected by bulletproof vests up to 4 class of protection inclusive at a distance of up to 50 meters.

57ae0171245977343c27bfcf.Name: Belomo PK-06 reflex sight
57ae0171245977343c27bfcf.Description: Open reflex sight with automatic reticle brightness adjustment and switching between 3 reticle types.

57c44f4f2459772d2c627113.Name: AS VAL Dust cover
57c44f4f2459772d2c627113.Description: Standard AS VAL dust cover manufactured by TSNIITochMash.

57cff947245977638e6f2a19.Name: Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD (Black) for AK
57cff947245977638e6f2a19.Description: The Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

57c55f112459772d28133310.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip Ghillie Green
57c55f112459772d28133310.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57cffcd624597763133760c5.Name: Magpul M-LOK AFG (Flat Dark Earth) Tactical grip
57cffcd624597763133760c5.Description: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip. Can only be installed on Magpul licensed M-LOK slot on the applicable equipment.

57c55efc2459772d2c6271e7.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip Black
57c55efc2459772d2c6271e7.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57c5ac0824597754771e88a9.Name: Optical scope March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP
57c5ac0824597754771e88a9.Description: March Tactical 3-24x42 First Focal Plane scope, reliable and accurate with ammunition of any power.

57cffddc24597763133760c6.Name: Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD (Flat Dark Earth) for AK
57cffddc24597763133760c6.Description: The Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

57cffcdd24597763f5110006.Description: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip. Can only be installed on Magpul licensed M-LOK slot on the applicable equipment.

57c55f172459772d27602381.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip OD Green
57c55f172459772d27602381.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57cffe0024597763b03fc60b.Description: The Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

57d14d2524597714373db789.Name: PP-91 Kedr 9x18PM SMG
57d14d2524597714373db789.Description: The PP-91 Kedr SMG was developed in the early 90s by the order of Ministry of Internal Affairs and is now produced at Zlatoust machinery plant (Zlatoustovskiy Mashinostroitelnyi Zavod, ZMZ). At the moment, it is a service weapon of almost all Russian law enforcement forces.

57c69dd424597774c03b7bbc.Name: 30mm Scope mount
57c69dd424597774c03b7bbc.Description: Universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails.

57cd379a24597778e7682ecf.Name: Downrange Tomahawk
57cd379a24597778e7682ecf.Description: Tactical tomahawk, multitool and breaching tool, all-in-one solution.

57d14e1724597714010c3f4b.Name: Standard 9x18PM 20-round magazine for PP-91
57d14e1724597714010c3f4b.Description: Standard 20-round capacity metal magazine for PP-91 Kedr-based SMGs, manufactured by ZMZ.

57c9a89124597704ee6faec1.Name: Sig Sauer FDE pistol grip for P226 (Combat)
57c9a89124597704ee6faec1.Description: Brown polymer Sig Sauer FDE pistol grip for P226. Used as standard service grip on P226 Combat.

57d152ec245977144076ccdf.Name: ZMZ Polymer pistol grip for PP-91
57d152ec245977144076ccdf.Description: ZMZ-produced polymer pistol grip for PP-91 Kedr and other SMGs based on it.

57da93632459771cb65bf83f.Name: KAC QDSS NT-4 Black 5.56х45 silencer
57da93632459771cb65bf83f.Description: KAC QDSS NT-4 5.56х45 and .223 silencer, can only be installed on compatible KAC muzzle devices.

57cffb66245977632f391a99.Name: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip
57cffb66245977632f391a99.Description: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip. Can only be installed on Magpul licensed M-LOK slot on the applicable equipment.

57c44dd02459772d2e0ae249.Name: AS VAL 9х39 integral barrel-suppressor
57c44dd02459772d2e0ae249.Description: TSNIITochMash-manufactured integral barrel-suppressor module for AS VAL.

57c450252459772d28133253.Description: Foldable skeleton stock for AS VAL produced by TSNIITochMash.

57c44e7b2459772d28133248.Name: AS VAL Standard rear sight
57c44e7b2459772d28133248.Description: Standard-issue adjustable distance mechanical rear sight for AS VAL.

57cffce524597763b31685d8.Name: Magpul M-LOK AFG (Stealth Gray) Tactical grip
57cffce524597763b31685d8.Description: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip. Can only be installed on Magpul licensed M-LOK slot on the applicable equipment.

57cffd8224597763b03fc609.Name: Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD (Flat Dark Earth) for AK
57cffd8224597763b03fc609.Description: The Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

57c55f092459772d291a8463.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip Ghillie Earth
57c55f092459772d291a8463.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57d17c5e2459775a5c57d17d.Name: Ultrafire WF-501B Flashlight
57d17c5e2459775a5c57d17d.Description: Simple but powerful LED flashlight with a sturdy body.

57cffe20245977632f391a9d.Name: Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD (Stealth Gray) for AK
57cffe20245977632f391a9d.Description: The Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

57dc334d245977597164366f.Name: AKS-74U Dust cover (6P26 Sb.7)
57dc334d245977597164366f.Description: Standard IzhMash-produced AKS-74U, AKS-74UN dust cover.

57dc347d245977596754e7a1.Name: IzhMash metal stock for AKS-74U (6P26 Sb.5)
57dc347d245977596754e7a1.Description: Metal skeleton stock for AKS-74U, AKS-74UN and AKS-74UB manufactured by IzhMash.

57dc32dc245977596d4ef3d3.Name: Wooden AKS-74U Handguard (6P26 Sb.6)
57dc32dc245977596d4ef3d3.Description: Standard-issue wooden handguard for AKS-74U, AKS-74UN and AKS-74UB, manufactured by IzhMash.

57d1519e24597714373db79d.Name: Standard 9x18PM 30-round magazine for PP-91
57d1519e24597714373db79d.Description: Standard 30-round capacity metal magazine for PP-91 Kedr-based SMGs, manufactured by ZMZ.

57dc2fa62459775949412633.Name: Kalashnikov AKS-74U 5.45x39
57dc2fa62459775949412633.Description: Reduced version of AKS-74 assault rifle, developed in the early 80s for combat vehicle crews and airborne troops, also became very popular with law enforcement and special forces for its compact size.

57d17e212459775a1179a0f5.Name: 25 mm mount ring
57d17e212459775a1179a0f5.Description: Universal platform for installation of 25 mm accessories on Picatinny mounts.

57dc324a24597759501edc20.Name: IzhMash 5.45x39 muzzle break for AKS-74U (6P26 0-20)
57dc324a24597759501edc20.Description: Standard-issue IzhMash muzzle break for AKS-74U and AKS-74UN, installed on 24x1.5 mm threading.

57ee59b42459771c7b045da5.Name: Rotor 43 RIS mount for PP Kedr
57ee59b42459771c7b045da5.Description: A RIS mount for PP Kedr manufactured by Rotor 43.

57dbb57e2459774673234890.Name: KAC QDSS NT-4 FDE 5.56х45 silencer
57dbb57e2459774673234890.Description: KAC QDSS NT-4 5.56х45 and .223 silencer, can only be installed on compatible KAC muzzle devices.

57e26ea924597715ca604a09.Name: Bars A-2607- Damascus
57e26ea924597715ca604a09.Description: A Bars knife A-2607, manufactured of damascus steel with wenge handle and brass guard.

57f3c7e024597738ea4ba286.Name: PP-91-01 Kedr-B muzzle thread piece
57f3c7e024597738ea4ba286.Description: Muzzle thread piece for PP-91-01 Kedr-B with expansion chamber.

57fd23e32459772d0805bcf1.Name: Holosun LS321 Tactical device
57fd23e32459772d0805bcf1.Description: Holosun LS321 is a multi-laser tactical device with green laser in the visible light spectrum, IR laser and IR searchlight.

57e26fc7245977162a14b800.Name: Bars A-2607- 95x18
57e26fc7245977162a14b800.Description: A Bars knife A-2607, forged of 95x18 steel with fine wood handle and brass guard.

57f3a5ae2459772b0e0bf19e.Name: PSO scope eyecup
57f3a5ae2459772b0e0bf19e.Description: Rubber eyecup for PSO scopes family

57ffb0062459777a045af529.Name: B-18 Mount
57ffb0062459777a045af529.Description: The B-18 rail mount is installed on the standard rear sight of AKS-74U forms a sight support hovering over the rifle dust cover.

5827272a24597748c74bdeea.Name: SOK-12 aluminum handguard MTU002 Long Top
5827272a24597748c74bdeea.Description: UTG PRO MTU002 Tactical Quad Rail Long Top is a lightweight aircraft grade aluminium handguard with sling swivel, designed for installation on Saiga carbines.

57ffaea724597779f52b3a4d.Name: B-12 Mount
57ffaea724597779f52b3a4d.Description: B-12 gas tube overhanging rail mount is installed on the side rail of the B-11 handguard and provides a weapon with means of installing a complex of sights and tactical devices by forming rail mounts over the weapon gas tube and on the side of a handguard.

57f3c8cc2459773ec4480328.Name: PP-91-01 Kedr-B 9x18PM suppressor
57f3c8cc2459773ec4480328.Description: Standard service detachable PP-91-01 Kedr-B 9x18PM suppressor. Can be removed for compact carrying purposes.

57e3dba62459770f0c32322b.Name: Izhmash AK-74 Textolite pistol grip (6P4 Sb.9)
57e3dba62459770f0c32322b.Description: Izhmash textolite pistol grip for AK-74 and compatible weapon systems.

583990e32459771419544dd2.Name: Kalashnikov AKS-74UN 5.45x39
583990e32459771419544dd2.Description: Reduced version of AKS-74 assault rifle, developed in the early 80s for combat vehicle crews and airborne troops, also became very popular with law enforcement and special forces for its compact size. Mod.N (night) is equipped with a dovetail mount for the night scopes.

57ffa9f4245977728561e844.Name: B-11 AKS-74U Handguard
57ffa9f4245977728561e844.Description: Integrally machined B-11 foregrip is manufactured from aluminium alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on AKS-74U. Fitted with Picatinny rail mounts on three sides, allowing installation of additional equipment (tactical foregrips, flashlights, laser designators).

57f3c6bd24597738e730fa2f.Name: PP-91-01 Kedr-B 9x18PM SMG
57f3c6bd24597738e730fa2f.Description: A rare silenced version of the PP-91 Kedr SMG, denominated as PP-91-01 Kedr-B.

58272b392459774b4c7b3ccd.Name: SOK-12 aluminum handguard MTU002 Short Top
58272b392459774b4c7b3ccd.Description: UTG PRO MTU002 Tactical Quad Rail Short Top is a lightweight aircraft grade aluminium handguard with sling swivel, designed for installation on Saiga carbines.

584924ec24597768f12ae244.Name: Eotech XPS3-2 holographic sight
584924ec24597768f12ae244.Description: XPS3 is more compact than the other holographic sights, but just as effective; moreover, such approach leaves more mounting space for additional equipment. Both hunters and armed forces operatives value it for small size and weight, which are particularly noticeable over long missions. The model 3-2 features a two-dot reticle of 1 MOA.

58272d7f2459774f6311ddfd.Name: GK-02 Muzzle Brake
58272d7f2459774f6311ddfd.Description: Ilyin GK-02 muzzle break is a modernized and improved version of Vsevolod Ilyin's muzzlebrake, with enhanced recoil and muzzle climb reduction capabilities.

57f4c844245977379d5c14d1.Name: PP-9 Klin 9x18PMM SMG
57f4c844245977379d5c14d1.Description: A further evolution of the Kedr SMG for new 9x18 PMM cartridge, designated as PP-9 Klin. Has been manufactured since 1996 till 2002 by the order of the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

57ffb0e42459777d047111c5.Name: PBS-4 5.45х39 Silencer
57ffb0e42459777d047111c5.Description: The PBS-4 silencer, manufactured by TSNIITochMash for use as a part of "Canary" assault rifle grenade launcher system.

587df583245977373c4f1129.Name: ProMag SKS-A5 7.62x39 20-round SKS magazine.
587df583245977373c4f1129.Description: 20-round polymer detachable SKS magazine for 7.62x39 cartridges.

584984812459776a704a82a6.Name: VOMZ Pilad P1X42 "WEAVER" reflex sight
584984812459776a704a82a6.Description: Open type reflex sight designed for precision aiming of sport and hunting weapons at different types of targets, including quickly moving ones.

58491f3324597764bc48fa02.Name: Eotech XPS3-0 holographic sight
58491f3324597764bc48fa02.Description: XPS3 is more compact than the other holographic sights, but just as effective; moreover, such approach leaves more mounting space for additional equipment. Both hunters and armed forces operatives value it for small size and weight, which are particularly noticeable over long missions. The model 3-0 features a two-dot reticle of 1 MOA.

5857a8b324597729ab0a0e7d.Name: Secure container Beta
5857a8b324597729ab0a0e7d.Description: Unique secure container used only by veterans of PMCs formerly deployed in Tarkov.

587de5ba2459771c0f1e8a58.Name: P226 thread protection cap
587de5ba2459771c0f1e8a58.Description: Threading protection cap for P226 barrel.

587e02ff24597743df3deaeb.Name:
Simonov Semi-Automatic Carbine SKS 7.62x39 Hunting Rifle
Version
587e02ff24597743df3deaeb.Description:
Molot OP-SKS Carbine is designed for loading with 7,62×39 — the most popular ammunition. The weight and dimensions make the carbine ergonomic for shooters of any age and height.
It has been used for all types of traditional Russian hunting for more than 50 years. Tested on predators in Africa, Southeast Asia, Central America, Middle East.

5857a8bc2459772bad15db29.Name: Secure container Gamma
5857a8bc2459772bad15db29.Description: Unique secure container used only by veterans of PMCs formerly deployed in Tarkov.

587e08ee245977446b4410cf.Name: Dovetail OP-SKS mount.
587e08ee245977446b4410cf.Description: Mount for installation of sights and other additional devices on OP-SKS.

587e0531245977466077a0f7.Name: Wooden stock for Molot OP-SKS
587e0531245977466077a0f7.Description: Standard-issue wooden OP-SKS stock produced by Molot.

5839a40f24597726f856b511.Name: Kalashnikov AKS-74UB 5.45x39
5839a40f24597726f856b511.Description: Special version of the AKS-74U, modification B (silenced) is issued, by default, with a dovetail scope mount, a sound suppressor device and special sights designed for firing subsonic ammunition.

58272b842459774abc128d50.Name: SOK-12 CSS SIGHT RAIL MOUNT rear sight
58272b842459774abc128d50.Description: Sight rail mount provides the means or placing different sights instead of the Saiga carbines standard-issue fixed rear sight.

5839a7742459773cf9693481.Name: IzhMash AKS-74UB Dust cover
5839a7742459773cf9693481.Description: Standard-issue AKS-74UB dust cover produced by IzhMash.

58864a4f2459770fcc257101.Name: 9x19 mm PSO gzh
58864a4f2459770fcc257101.Description: 9x19 mm PSO gzh- a sport hunting cartridge.

588200c224597743990da9ed.Name: 660 mm barrel for MP-153 12ga shotgun
588200c224597743990da9ed.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for МР-153 shotgun, 660 mm long for 12ga shells.

588892092459774ac91d4b11.Name: DVL-10 Saboteur sniper rifle
588892092459774ac91d4b11.Description: DVL-10 is a lightweight, compact and silenced rifle in proprietary and current military subsonic calibers has been developed for special service and combat missions where exceptional accuracy and range are needed. Equipped with standard Lobaev foldable butt-stock and Lobaev Hummer Barrels stainless steel match-grade barrel.

590a3efd86f77437d351a25b.Description: Measuring device for determining the qualitative and quantitative composition of gas mixtures. Has a very wide range of applications - in environmental protection, internal combustion engines management systems and medicine.

590a3c0a86f774385a33c450.Name: Spark plug
590a3c0a86f774385a33c450.Description: Gasoline internal combustion engines use spark plugs. Ignition of the fuel-air mixture is produced by electric discharge with a voltage of several thousand or tens of thousands of volts, emerging between the electrodes. The plug fires on each round, at one point of the engine operating cycle.

590a373286f774287540368b.Name: Dry fuel
590a373286f774287540368b.Description: Dry fuel - in household use it is commonly referred to as dry alcohol. Dry fuel consists of urotropine pressed with a small amount of wax. Typically used for heating or cooking food in field conditions by tourists, military and rescue organizations.

590a386e86f77429692b27ab.Name: Damaged hard drive
590a386e86f77429692b27ab.Description: Random access storage device (information storage device), based on the magnetic recording principle. Serves as the main data drive in most computers. From broken disks, hardware specialists salvage the controllers and magnets for re-use in other electronics.

5909e99886f7740c983b9984.Name: USB Adapter
5909e99886f7740c983b9984.Description: Battery charger with USB output. Used to be an indispensable household item.

590c346786f77423e50ed342.Name: Xenomorph sealing foam
590c346786f77423e50ed342.Description: Xenomorph is a sealing foam with an excellent structure of cells and high mechanical strength. Easy to use, applied with a thin applicator tube. Foam is an expandable material that doubles its volume on solidification. Has excellent adhesion to most building materials such as wood, concrete, stone, metal, etc. This product does not contain any chloro-fluoro-carbon propellants. A reliable and cost-effective solution for sealing and filling the voids.

590a358486f77429692b2790.Name: Rechargeable battery
590a358486f77429692b2790.Description: Chemical source of electric current, reusable source of voltage, characterized by the reversibility of internal chemical processes that ensures its repeated cyclic use (via charge-discharge) for energy accumulation and autonomous power supply of various electrical devices and equipment, as well as providing backup power sources in medicine, manufacturing and other areas.

590a3d9c86f774385926e510.Name: Ultraviolet lamp
590a3d9c86f774385926e510.Description: UV lamp for household use is a type of light bulb which source of light is invisible to the human eye, located on the border of the purple spectrum and x-ray radiation. UV radiation has beneficial effects on all the systems of human and animal bodies, contributing to the development of a strong defensive system against viral and infectious diseases, such as seasonal colds.

590c2c9c86f774245b1f03f2.Name: Construction measuring tape
590c2c9c86f774245b1f03f2.Description: Tool designed to measure length. Indispensable in construction and renovation.

590a3cd386f77436f20848cb.Name: Energy-saving lamp
590a3cd386f77436f20848cb.Description: Electric lamp with substantially greater luminous efficiency (the ratio of luminous flux and power consumption), for example, in comparison with filament lamps which are still rather common. Thanks to that, the replacement of incandescent light bulbs with energy-saving ones saves energy, protecting the environment.

590c62a386f77412b0130255.Name: Sliderkey Secure Flash drive

According to the producing company legend, the product formula was developed with the fortieth attempt (WD-40 as short for Water Displacement-40th Attempt). The product consists mostly of various hydrocarbon.

Due to the fact that the vest is based on MOLLE system, it can be used with various compatible pouches beyond those included into the kit. 59faf7ca86f7740dbe19f6c2.Name: Roler submariner gold wrist watch
